text: "Voulez-Vous" ( ; French for "Do you want?") is a 1979 song by ABBA and is the title track to their sixth studio album Voulez-Vous and also features on their 1992 album Gold: Greatest Hits. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and the Netherlands, number 80 in the United States, number 79 in Australia, number 87 in Canada, number 9 in Sweden, Spain and France and number 20 in Finland. It was not a major hit for the group. ==Track listings== *7-inch vinyl :A: "Voulez-Vous" :B: "Angeleyes" *12-inch vinyl :A: "Voulez- Vous" :B: "Does Your Mother Know" *1992 CD re-issue #"Voulez Vous" #"Summer Night City" ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Disco songs Category:ABBA songs
title: Voulez-Vous (song)
